:py:mod:`torch_mist.distributions.product`
==========================================

.. py:module:: torch_mist.distributions.product


Module Contents
---------------

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   torch_mist.distributions.product.ShuffledBatchDistribution




.. py:class:: ShuffledBatchDistribution(y: torch.Tensor)


   Bases: :py:obj:`torch.distributions.Distribution`

   Distribution is the abstract base class for probability distributions.

   .. py:method:: rsample(sample_shape=torch.Size())

      Generates a sample_shape shaped reparameterized sample or sample_shape
      shaped batch of reparameterized samples if the distribution parameters
      are batched.


   .. py:method:: sample(sample_shape=torch.Size())

      Generates a sample_shape shaped sample or sample_shape shaped batch of
      samples if the distribution parameters are batched.
